overview: Visual Studio subscriptions for both subscription and usage-based GitHub Enterprise now support data residency. This allows you to access GitHub Enterprise features through your Visual Studio subscription while maintaining compliance with regional data requirements.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Visual Studio subscriptions for both subscription and usage-based GitHub Enterprise now support data residency. This allows you to access GitHub Enterprise features through your Visual Studio subscription while maintaining compliance with regional data requirements.
For more information, learn about Visual Studio subscriptions with GitHub Enterprise or visit our data residency documentation .
